prokka_compliance_centre.description: Specify sequencing centre name required for Prokka's compliance mode.

save_checkm_data.description: Save the used CheckM reference files downloaded when not using --checkm_db parameter.

binning_map_mode.description: Defines mapping strategy to compute co-abundances for binning, i.e. which samples will be mapped against the assembly.

save_filtered_longreads.description: Specify to save the resulting length filtered long read FASTQ files to --outdir.

adapterremoval_trim_quality_stretch.description: Turn on quality trimming by consecutive stretch of low quality bases, rather than by window.

plaintext_email.description: Send plain-text email instead of HTML.

genomad_db.description: Database for virus classification with geNomad

adapterremoval_adapter2.description: Reverse read adapter to be trimmed by AdapterRemoval for paired end data.

multiqc_config.description: Custom config file to supply to MultiQC.

adapterremoval_adapter1.description: Forward read adapter to be trimmed by AdapterRemoval.

save_clipped_reads.description: Specify to save the resulting clipped FASTQ files to --outdir.

host_genome.description: Name of iGenomes reference for host contamination removal.

bbnorm_min.description: Set BBnorm minimum depth to this number.

skip_adapter_trimming.description: Skip removing adapter sequences from long reads.

host_fasta_bowtie2index.description: Bowtie2 index directory corresponding to `--host_fasta` reference file for host contamination removal.

cat_official_taxonomy.description: Only return official taxonomic ranks (Kingdom, Phylum, etc.) when running CAT.

gtdbtk_min_af.description: Min. alignment fraction to consider closest genome.

save_mmseqs_db.description: Save the downloaded mmseqs2 database specified in `--metaeuk_mmseqs_db`.

single_end.description: Specifies that the input is single-end reads.

multiqc_logo.description: Custom logo file to supply to MultiQC. File name must also be set in the MultiQC config file

reads_minlength.description: The minimum length of reads must have to be retained for downstream analysis.

multiqc_methods_description.description: Custom MultiQC yaml file containing HTML including a methods description.

skip_metaeuk.description: Skip MetaEuk gene prediction and annotation

postbinning_input.description: Specify which binning output is sent for downstream annotation, taxonomic classification, bin quality control etc.

gtdbtk_pplacer_cpus.description: Number of CPUs used for the by GTDB-Tk run tool pplacer.

spades_options.description: Additional custom options for SPAdes and SPAdesHybrid. Do not specify `--meta` as this will be added for you!

bbnorm.description: Run BBnorm to normalize sequence depth.

publish_dir_mode.description: Method used to save pipeline results to output directory.

input.description: CSV samplesheet file containing information about the samples in the experiment.

centrifuge_db.description: Database for taxonomic binning with centrifuge.

ancient_dna.description: Turn on/off the ancient DNA subworfklow

fastp_save_trimmed_fail.description: Save reads that fail fastp filtering in a separate file. Not used downstream.

skip_krona.description: Skip creating a krona plot for taxonomic binning.

busco_auto_lineage_prok.description: Run BUSCO with automated lineage selection, but ignoring eukaryotes (saves runtime).

adapterremoval_minquality.description: The minimum base quality for low-quality base trimming by AdapterRemoval.

metaeuk_db.description: Path to either a local fasta file of protein sequences or a directory containing an mmseqs2-formatted database, for annotation of eukaryotic genomes.

tiara_min_length.description: Minimum contig length for Tiara to use for domain classification. For accurate classification, should be longer than 3000 bp.

custom_config_version.description: Git commit id for Institutional configs.

binqc_tool.description: Specify which tool for bin quality-control validation to use.

gtdb_db.description: Specify the location of a GTDBTK database. Can be either an uncompressed directory or a `.tar.gz` archive. If not specified will be downloaded for you when GTDBTK or binning QC is not skipped.

gunc_save_db.description: Save the used GUNC reference files downloaded when not using --gunc_db parameter.

checkm2_db.description: Path to local file of an already downloaded and uncompressed CheckM2 database (.dmnd file).

clip_tool.description: Specify which adapter clipping tool to use.

gtdb_mash.description: Specify the location of a GTDBTK mash database. If missing, GTDB-Tk will skip the ani_screening step

checkm_db.description: Path to local folder containing already downloaded and uncompressed CheckM database.

save_cat_db.description: Save the CAT database generated when specified by `--cat_db_generate`.

genomad_splits.description: Number of groups that geNomad's MMSeqs2 databse should be split into (reduced memory requirements)

min_contig_size.description: Minimum contig size to be considered for binning and for bin quality check.

phix_reference.description: Genome reference used to remove Illumina PhiX contaminant reads.

bcftools_view_high_variant_quality.description: minimum genotype quality for considering a variant high quality

checkm2_db_version.description: CheckM2 database version number to download (Zenodo record ID, for reference check the canonical reference https://zenodo.org/records/5571251, and pick the Zenodo ID of the database version of your choice).

save_bbnorm_reads.description: Save normalized read files to output directory.

genomad_min_score.description: Minimum geNomad score for a sequence to be considered viral

bin_concoct_overlap.description: Specify the overlap between each sub-contig prior CONCOCT binning

skip_gtdbtk.description: Skip the running of GTDB, as well as the automatic download of the database

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

pipelines_testdata_base_path.description: Base URL or local path to location of pipeline test dataset files

spades_fix_cpus.description: Fix number of CPUs used by SPAdes. Not increased with retries.

save_assembly_mapped_reads.description: Save the output of mapping raw reads back to assembled contigs

bin_concoct_chunksize.description: Specify length of sub-contigs cut up prior CONCOCT binning

keep_phix.description: Keep reads similar to the Illumina internal standard PhiX genome.

save_busco_db.description: Save the used BUSCO lineage datasets provided via `--busco_db`.

assembly_input.description: Additional input CSV samplesheet containing information about pre-computed assemblies. When set, both read pre-processing and assembly are skipped and the pipeline begins at the binning stage.

save_checkm2_data.description: Save the used CheckM2 reference files downloaded when not using --checkm2_db parameter.

save_porechop_reads.description: Specify to save the resulting clipped FASTQ files to --outdir.

exclude_unbins_from_postbinning.description: Exclude unbinned contigs in the post-binning steps (bin QC, taxonomic classification, and annotation steps).

gtdbtk_min_completeness.description: Min. bin completeness (in %) required to apply GTDB-tk classification.

host_removal_save_ids.description: Save the read IDs of removed host reads.

longread_filtering_tool.description: Specify which long read filtering tool to use.

gtdbtk_max_contamination.description: Max. bin contamination (in %) allowed to apply GTDB-tk classification.

bcftools_view_medium_variant_quality.description: minimum genotype quality for considering a variant medium quality

spades_downstreaminput.description: Specify whether to use contigs or scaffolds assembled by SPAdes

fastp_qualified_quality.description: Minimum phred quality value of a base to be qualified in fastp.

keep_lambda.description: Keep reads similar to the ONT internal standard Escherichia virus Lambda genome.

max_multiqc_email_size.description: File size limit when attaching MultiQC reports to summary emails.

hook_url.description: Incoming hook URL for messaging service

longreads_length_weight.description: The higher the more important is read length when choosing the best reads.

gtdbtk_min_perc_aa.description: Min. fraction of AA (in %) in the MSA for bins to be kept.

min_length_unbinned_contigs.description: Minimal length of contigs that are not part of any bin but treated as individual genome.

gunc_db.description: Specify a path to a pre-downloaded GUNC dmnd database file

validate_params.description: Boolean whether to validate parameters against the schema at runtime

email_on_fail.description: Email address for completion summary, only when pipeline fails.

megahit_fix_cpu_1.description: Fix number of CPUs for MEGAHIT to 1. Not increased with retries.

checkm_download_url.description: URL pointing to checkM database for auto download, if local path not supplied.

skip_ancient_damagecorrection.description: deactivate damage correction of ancient contigs using variant and consensus calling

freebayes_minallelefreq.description: minimum minor allele frequency for considering variants

skip_clipping.description: Skip read preprocessing using fastp or adapterremoval.

busco_clean.description: Enable clean-up of temporary files created during BUSCO runs.

freebayes_min_basequality.description: minimum base quality required for variant calling

host_removal_verysensitive.description: Use the `--very-sensitive` instead of the`--sensitive`setting for Bowtie 2 to map reads against the host genome.

bin_domain_classification_tool.description: Specify which tool to use for domain classification of bins. Currently only 'tiara' is implemented.

igenomes_base.description: The base path to the igenomes reference files

trace_report_suffix.description: Suffix to add to the trace report filename. Default is the date and time in the format yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss.

bbnorm_target.description: Set BBnorm target maximum depth to this number.

gunc_database_type.description: Specify which database to auto-download if not supplying own

lambda_reference.description: Genome reference used to remove ONT Lambda contaminant reads.

multiqc_title.description: MultiQC report title. Printed as page header, used for filename if not otherwise specified.

run_gunc.description: Turn on GUNC genome chimerism checks

save_hostremoved_reads.description: Specify to save input FASTQ files with host reads removed to --outdir.

host_fasta.description: Fasta reference file for host contamination removal.

refine_bins_dastool.description: Turn on bin refinement using DAS Tool.

max_unbinned_contigs.description: Maximal number of contigs that are not part of any bin but treated as individual genome.

bin_concoct_donotconcatlast.description: Specify to not append the last contig less than sub-contig length to the last correct length contig

bcftools_view_minimal_allelesupport.description: minimum number of bases supporting the alternative allele

longreads_min_quality.description: Discard any read which has a mean quality score lower than this value.

bin_domain_classification.description: Enable domain-level (prokaryote or eukaryote) classification of bins using Tiara. Processes which are domain-specific will then only receive bins matching the domain requirement.

kraken2_db.description: Database for taxonomic binning with kraken2.

busco_db.description: Download URL for BUSCO lineage dataset, or path to a tar.gz archive, or local directory containing already downloaded and unpacked lineage datasets.

spadeshybrid_fix_cpus.description: Fix number of CPUs used by SPAdes hybrid. Not increased with retries.

metaeuk_mmseqs_db.description: A string containing the name of a formatted mmseqs2 database for eukaryotic genome annotation. Incompatible with --metaeuk_db.

fastp_cut_mean_quality.description: The mean quality requirement used for per read sliding window cutting by fastp.

longread_adaptertrimming_tool.description: Specify which long read adapter trimming tool to use.

gtdbtk_pplacer_useram.description: Speed up pplacer step of GTDB-Tk by loading to memory.

krona_db.description: Database for taxonomic binning with krona

igenomes_ignore.description: Do not load the iGenomes reference config.

prokka_with_compliance.description: Turn on Prokka complicance mode for truncating contig names for NCBI/ENA compatibility.

save_lambdaremoved_reads.description: Specify to save input FASTQ files with lamba reads removed  to --outdir.

refine_bins_dastool_threshold.description: Specify single-copy gene score threshold for bin refinement.

skip_binqc.description: Disable bin QC with BUSCO, CheckM or CheckM2.

save_phixremoved_reads.description: Specify to save input FASTQ files with phiX reads removed to --outdir.

cat_db.description: Database for taxonomic classification of metagenome assembled genomes. Can be either a zipped file or a directory containing the extracted output of such.

longreads_min_length.description: Discard any read which is shorter than this value.

coassemble_group.description: Co-assemble samples within one group, instead of assembling each sample separately.
